import React from 'react' import * as Yup from 'yup' import { Formik,Form,ErrorMessage,Field } from 'formik' const initialValues={ name:'', email:'', rating:'', review:'' } const onSubmit=(values,{resetForm})=>{ console.log('Form values : ',values); resetForm(); } const validationSchema=Yup.object({ name: Yup.string().required('Required'), email:Yup.string().email('Invalid email Format').required('Required'), rating:Yup.number().required("Required").min(1,'Must be greater than 1').max(5,'Must be less than or equal to 5'), review:Yup.string().required('Required') }) export default function reviewForm() { return (

Form
) }
